schedule.query: select * from launchd where name = 'com.whitesmoke.uploader.plist';
schedule.value: Whitesmoke: Artifact used by this malware

schedule.query: select * from launchd where name = 'com.apple.legion.plist' or name = 'com.apple.pixel.plist';

schedule.query: select * from xprotect_reports;
schedule.description: Report on Apple/OS X XProtect 'report' generation. Reports are generated when OS X matches an item in xprotect_entries.
schedule.value: xprotect_reports: Although XProtect reports are rare, they may be worth collecting and aggregating internally.

schedule.query: select * from launchd where name = 'com.apple.machook_damon.plist' or name = 'com.apple.globalupdate.plist' or name = 'com.apple.appstore.plughelper.plist' or name = 'com.apple.MailServiceAgentHelper.plist' or name = 'com.apple.systemkeychain-helper.plist' or name = 'com.apple.periodic-dd-mm-yy.plist';
